title: marakkAdE manamE
sahitya:
marakkAdE manamE ini orukkAlum muruganai


anupallavi

  irakkamoDu aDiyArin kurai tIravE pirakkum karuNaiyODu sirakkum kArtikEya mUrtiyai


caraNam    sharamenru tannaDi sEruvOrai ellAm aravaNaittiDuvadil sari nigharrillAdOnai
karuNaikkOr uruvAga tiruk-kATSi taruvOnai tirupparankunrattE sirippoDu iruppOnai
